text: The Diocese of Rome (;Annuario Pontificio 2012, p. 1 ) is a diocese under the jurisdiction of the Pope, who is also the Bishop of Rome. The first bishop of Rome was Saint Peter. The current Bishop of Rome is Pope Leo XIV. ==Notes== == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the Diocese of Rome * History World article on Bishops of Rome Category:1st-century establishments in Europe Rome
title: Diocese of Rome
